name: Pick 'n' Mix Cards - Ten 4 Ten
description:
Can't decide? Want even more for your money? The Pick 'n' Mix option lets you choose 10 cards for £10. Giving you more freedom and a saving of £2.50. 

This deal includes any of the 125 x 125mm cards that are listed individually for £1.25. Choose any combinations or multiples from the list below. See the images for each designs reference Letter:

A - Beige on Blue - Cupcake Love
B - Blue on Beige - Cupcake Love
C - Epicentre - Japanese Floral
D - Bloomer - Japanese Floral
E - Foxy - Rock Chic
F - Mystic - Rock Chic
G - Hot - Rock Chic
H - Bombshell - Rock Chic
I - Thank You Rosette
J - We've Moved

All cards will be supplied with White 130 x 130mm Diamond, gum flapped Envelopes! 

PLEASE READ ME: 

You will need to Send me a message through the Contacts section at the top of the page. 

Firstly Pop the Full Name and Address you made the order with at the top of your message. Then list the Letters that refer to the design you want as seen in the images. Please follow each letter with the quantity you require

For example:

Mrs Jane Jackson
10 Street
Town
Post Code

A 2
D 3
F 1
G 1
H 2
J 1


Any queries, please feel free to contact me!
